about_the_game:
Sleek modern production techniques and cutting edge synth tones make this pack of ultra-modern / futuristic ME a must have! 100 ME for modern game events such as fanfare, finding, happy / sad, item get, save, beginnings, storyline, and more!

Features:

* 100 ME for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Cyberpunk ME for futuristc fantasy, modern adventure and much more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engines of your choice!

Tracklist:

CPRMPC_ME001_Fanfare 1-5
CPRMPC_ME006_Happy 6-10
CPRMPC_ME011_Pleasure 11-15
CPRMPC_ME016_Find 16-20
CPRMPC_ME021_Comical 21-25
CPRMPC_ME026_ItemGet 26-30
CPRMPC_ME031_BigItemGet 31-35
CPRMPC_ME036_Shock 36-40
CPRMPC_ME041_Confusion 41-45
CPRMPC_ME046_Horror 46-50
CPRMPC_ME051_Scary 51-55
CPRMPC_ME056_Mystery 56-65
CPRMPC_ME066_Temptation 66-70
CPRMPC_ME071_Inn 71-75
CPRMPC_ME076_Save 76-80
CPRMPC_ME081_Story 81-100
